name: kids dogs lovers - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different sets:

first game:
In this game your child will direct a rocket. To win it is necessary to collect a maximum point going as high as possible. For this, your child must avoid the obstacles and collect cans of fuel. In the two player mode the winner will be one who will climb as high as possible. When a level is successful a dog picture becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game your child flies a helicopter. The goal is to collect the blue balls without hitting opponents. To find these blue balls your child needs to use radar. This is both a game of skill and speed. When a level is successful a dog picture becomes available in the image gallery.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay suitable for children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of dogs.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 images of dogs to release.

the following languages ​​are available:

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malaysian, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
